Title: Requires counseling for certain domestic violence offenders
Summary: Requires counseling for certain domestic violence offenders; requires defendants in any case where the court either suspends the imposition of a sentence or sentences the defendant to be placed on probation to receive counseling by a person who has demonstrated expertise in individual or group domestic violence counseling.
LawCode: Amd ยง65.10, add ยง60.38, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to requiring counseling for certain domestic violence offenders
